extendedInfo.description: Simple reference to the Texas Penal Code current through the 81st Legislature. Also available is the Texas Family Code, Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, Texas Transportation Code and Texas Alcoholic Beverage Code. Great for police!

reviews.title: Complete Garbage!
reviews.comment: No updates provided and the material is not complete.  I purchased them and have waited months to see if there was an update coming. Nothing.   Save your money folks, it is not worth it on this product!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unimpressed
reviews.comment: Not very easy to navigate. Needs Alot of work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not complete. Ch 22 is incomplete, chapters end at Ch. 30. Probably are more errors, but i quit looking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app does not have all chapters in the penal code. There are also parts left out in the included chapters. Hopefully there will be an update soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Everything about the penal code is in there! App works great!
reviews.author: A Google User
